synopsis.text: Jugyeong is a shy, comic-loving student who gets bullied for her looks. To leave that pain behind, she masters makeup artistry and transfers to the beauty-obsessed Saebom High. As the next candidate for the coveted “True Beauty Goddess” title, Jugyeong quickly becomes popular. However, mean girl Sujin aims to sabotage Jugyeong's chances out of jealousy. Things get complicated when heartthrob Suho accidentally sees Jugyeong without makeup. Additionally, the intriguing SeoJun is determined to uncover her made-up identity. As Jugyeong gets entangled with the two boys, she must confront the ruthless beauty standards that once wounded her. Through new connections and self-discovery, she learns that one’s worth is beyond appearances. Will Jugyeong triumph over Sujin’s schemes and pressures to be perfect? Can she embrace her bare face along with made-up beauty? Join her poignant journey toward confidence, truth and inner radiance in the dramatic world of “True Beauty.”
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
